001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.jsr310.JavaTimeModule;
006
007import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
008import java.util.Map;
009import java.util.Objects;
010import java.util.Set;
011import java.util.stream.IntStream;
012import java.util.stream.Stream;
013
014import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreStreamUtils.nameValue;
015
016/**
017 * A static-factory that provides an implementation of of {@link TreeDumper.Node}
018 * over {@link JsonNode}, which is the base data-unit that is provided by
019 * <a href="https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson?tab=readme-ov-file">Jackson-library</a>.
020 * <hr/>
021 * Utility-classes {@link DumpUtils}, {@link PrintUtils} and {@link ToFileUtils}
022 * use the default static instance of this class - {@link #DEFAULT_JACKSON_TREE} via {@link ObjectPrinter.UnitOp}.
023 */
024public class JacksonTree {
025
026    public static final ObjectMapper DEFAULT_MAPPER = new ObjectMapper().registerModule(new JavaTimeModule());
027
028    static final JacksonTree DEFAULT_JACKSON_TREE = new JacksonTree(DEFAULT_MAPPER);
029
030    final ObjectMapper jacksonMapper;
031
032    /**
033     * An optional public constructor that allows to provide an instance of {@link ObjectMapper Jackson-ObjectMapper}
034     * that is different from the default one - {@link #DEFAULT_MAPPER}.
035     *
036     * @param jacksonMapper an instance of {@link ObjectMapper Jackson-ObjectMapper}
037     */
038    public JacksonTree(ObjectMapper jacksonMapper) {
039        this.jacksonMapper = jacksonMapper;
040    }
041
042    /**
043     * An entry-point of this static-factory, that is used as singleton
044     * over the predefined static instance of {@link ObjectMapper} - {@link #DEFAULT_MAPPER}.
045     * <hr/>
046     * In order to customize the default behavior you could either
047     * register additional {@link Module Jackson-ObjectMapper-Module}s
048     * or provide your own instance of {@link ObjectMapper Jackson-ObjectMapper}
049     *
050     * @param fromValue the object to build the Jackson-Tree from as an instance of {@link JsonNode Jackson-Tree-Node}
051     * @return the instance of {@link TreeDumper.Node}, which repeats the hierarchy of {@link JsonNode Jackson-Tree-Node}
052     */
053    public TreeDumper.Node dumperNode(Object fromValue) {
054        if (fromValue == null) {
055            return TreeDumper.NULL;
056        } else if (fromValue instanceof TreeDumper.Node dumperNode) {
057            return dumperNode;
058        }
059        JsonNode root = jacksonMapper.valueToTree(fromValue);
060        return fromJsonNode(root);
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * A factory-method that returns an implementation of {@link TreeDumper.Node}
065     * over {@link JsonNode}, which is the base data-unit that is provided by
066     * <a href="https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson?tab=readme-ov-file">Jackson-library</a>
067     *
068     * @param jsonNode an instance of {@link JsonNode}
069     * @return a proper implementation of {@link TreeDumper.Node}
070     */
071    public static TreeDumper.Node fromJsonNode(JsonNode jsonNode) {
072        if (jsonNode == null) {
073            return TreeDumper.NULL;
074        }
075        return switch (jsonNode.getNodeType()) {
076            case NULL -> TreeDumper.NULL;
077            case ARRAY -> new SequenceNode(jsonNode);
078            case OBJECT, POJO -> new MappingsNode(jsonNode);
079            default -> new ScalarNode(jsonNode);
080        };
081    }
082
083
084    abstract static class JacksonNode implements TreeDumper.Node {
085        protected final JsonNode jsonNode;
086        protected JacksonNode(JsonNode jsonNode) {
087            this.jsonNode = Objects.requireNonNull(jsonNode);
088        }
089    }
090
091    static class ScalarNode extends JacksonNode implements TreeDumper.ScalarNode {
092        protected ScalarNode (JsonNode jsonNode) {
093            super(jsonNode);
094        }
095        @Override
096        public String text() {
097            return jsonNode.asText();
098        }
099        @Override
100        public void visit(TreeDumper dumper) {
101            dumper.acceptScalar(this);
102        }
103    }
104
105    static class SequenceNode extends JacksonNode implements TreeDumper.SequenceNode {
106        protected SequenceNode (JsonNode jsonNode) {
107            super(jsonNode);
108        }
109        @Override
110        public Stream<TreeDumper.Node> sequenceItems() {
111            return IntStream.range(0, jsonNode.size())
112                .mapToObj(jsonNode::get)
113                .map(JacksonTree::fromJsonNode);
114        }
115        @Override
116        public void visit(TreeDumper dumper) {
117            dumper.acceptSequence(this);
118        }
119    }
120
121    static class MappingsNode extends JacksonNode implements TreeDumper.MappingsNode {
122        private final Set<String> fieldNames = new LinkedHashSet<>();
123        protected MappingsNode (JsonNode jsonNode) {
124            super(jsonNode);
125            jsonNode.fieldNames().forEachRemaining(fieldNames::add);
126        }
127        @Override
128        public Stream<Map.Entry<String, TreeDumper.Node>> mappingsItems() {
129            return fieldNames.stream().map(name -> {
130                JsonNode fieldNode = jsonNode.get(name);
131                return nameValue(name, fromJsonNode(fieldNode));
132            });
133        }
134        @Override
135        public void visit(TreeDumper dumper) {
136            dumper.acceptMappings(this);
137        }
138    }
139}
